user.title: iPhone Alarms Sync
user.description:
Choose how to add your iPhone/iPad:

- **Mobile App devices** - Links to your HA mobile app device
- **Custom name** - Standalone device

select_mobile_app.title: Select Mobile App Device
select_mobile_app.description: Select your device from Mobile App integration.

custom_name.title: Enter Device Name
custom_name.description:
Enter a name for your iPhone/iPad (e.g., "John's iPhone").

This generates a **Phone ID** needed for the shortcut setup.

confirm.title: Setup Shortcut
confirm.description:
**Phone ID:** `{phone_id}`

## Step 1: Import Shortcut

Scan QR code or open link on your iPhone/iPad:

![QR Code]({qr_code})

[Open Shortcut]({shortcut_url})

When prompted, enter Device ID: `{phone_id}`

## Step 2: Create Automation

1. Shortcuts app → Automation → +
2. App → Clock → Is Closed
3. Run Shortcut → "Sync Alarms With HA"
4. Enable "Run Immediately" → Done

already_configured.title: Device Already Configured
already_configured.description:
Device with Phone ID `{phone_id}` already exists as "{existing_title}".

Choose a different name or edit the existing device in Settings → Integrations.

error.phone_id_exists: A device with this Phone ID already exists. Choose a different name.

abort.no_mobile_app_devices: No Mobile App devices found. Use custom name option.
abort.integration_not_ready: Integration not ready. Reload and try again.
abort.already_configured: Device with Phone ID `{phone_id}` already exists as "{existing_title}".

edit_device.title: Edit Device
edit_device.description: ⚠️ Changing device name generates a new Phone ID. Update your shortcut if changed.

event_shortcuts.title: Event Shortcuts Setup
event_shortcuts.description:
**Phone ID:** `{phone_id}`

**Services:**
- `iphone_alarms_sync.report_alarm_event` - For specific alarms (needs `alarm_id`)
- `iphone_alarms_sync.report_wakeup_event` - For Wake-Up alarm
- `iphone_alarms_sync.report_any_event` - For any alarm

**Sleep Events:**
- `report_bedtime_event`, `report_waking_up_event`, `report_wind_down_event`

**Alarms:** {alarms_list}

**Event Types:** `goes_off`, `snoozed`, `stopped`
